sentences.en: And a While , the young man stood by , shamefaced , and downat - heel , submitting.
sentences.cn: 年轻男人一直低头站在那里,满脸羞涩, 唯唯诺诺.

sentences.en: Do not be so shamefaced. You'll do it very well.
sentences.cn: 别那么脸皮薄,你会做得很好的.

sentences.en: Ms. Denholtz says the store has had several experiences with shamefaced shoppers like this recently.
sentences.cn: 丹霍兹说,最近该店有好几次碰到这样感觉羞愧的顾客来退货.

words.tran_cn: 谦逊的；害羞的；不惹眼的
